author: daxian-dbw
body:
Use [`Microsoft.NETCore.App 2.0.4-servicing-25831-01`](https://dotnet.myget.org/feed/dotnet-core/package/nuget/Microsoft.NETCore.App/2.0.4-servicing-25831-01) to build powershell.
Also update to dotnet core SDK 2.0.2.

The CoreCLR issue https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/issues/9745 is fixed in the 2.0.4-servicing packages.
PowerShell will use .NET Core 2.0.4 servicing for the GA build, so we move to the 2.0.4 preview bits to validate dotnet core packages early.

Fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/5157
title: Update powershell to use 2.0.4-servicing dotnet core runtime
